template.value: mkdir -p ~/.ssh && cat /dev/zero | ssh-keygen -q -N "" && ssh-keyscan -t rsa github.com > ~/.ssh/known_hosts &&

template.name: dvpsController
settingsGradleProjectName
template.value: rootProject.children.each { project -> project.buildFileName = "${project.name}.gradle" assert project.projectDir.isDirectory() assert project.buildFile.exists() assert project.buildFile.isFile() }

jeeDockerEntry
template.value: $NAME$: image: $NAME$ dns: 172.17.0.1 ports: - "8080" links: - payment-service - rabbitmq - eureka-server environment: RABBITMQ_HOST: rabbitmq EUREKA_SERV: http://eureka:8761/eureka/ SERVICE_NAME: $NAME$ SERVICE_CHECK_HTTP: /health SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE: consul SPRING_ZIPKIN_BASEURL: http://192.168.99.100:9000

template.name: jeeDockerConsul
template.value:
consul: image: gliderlabs/consul-server:0.5 container_name: consul ports: - "8400:8400" - "8500:8500" - "53:8600/udp" command: "-bootstrap -advertise 192.168.99.100 -ui-dir /ui" restart: always
registrator: image: gliderlabs/registrator container_name: registrator net: "host" volumes: - "/var/run/docker.sock:/tmp/docker.sock" command: "-ip 192.168.99.100 consul://192.168.99.100:8500" restart: always

template.name: jeeDockerGateway
template.value: gateway-server: image: gateway-server container_name: gateway-server ports: - "9000:9000" restart: always

template.name: jeeDockerTurbine
template.value: turbine-server: image: turbine-server container_name: turbine-server dns: 172.17.0.1 environment: RABBITMQ_HOST: rabbitmq links: - rent-service - payment-service - rabbitmq ports: - "9001:9001" restart: always

template.name: jeeDockerOpsServer
template.value: ops-server: image: ops-server container_name: ops-server dns: 172.17.0.1 ports: - "9411:9411" restart: always

template.name: jeeDockerGatewayServer
template.value: gateway-server: image: gateway-server container_name: gateway-server dns: 172.17.0.1 ports: - "9000:9000" environment: EUREKA_SERV: http://eureka:8761/eureka/ RABBITMQ_HOST: rabbitmq links: - rent-service - payment-service - turbine-server - ops-server - rabbitmq - eureka-server restart: always
